title: What Will the Future of the NBA on TV Look Like? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by CNBC sports business reporter Jabari Young to discuss how the next NBA TV deal could change how we watch basketball (02:00). Later, Chris and The Ringer’s Bryan Curtis weigh in on how the NBA television and League Pass experience could be improved (23:00).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Jabari Young and Bryan Curtis
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
